• sync
   1 # -*- coding=utf-8 -*-
   2 
   3 from __future__ import absolute_import, print_function, unicode_literals
   4 
   5 
   6 def sync(project=None, dev=False, clean=True):
   7     from passa.models.synchronizers import Synchronizer
   8     from passa.operations.sync import sync
   9 
  10     project = project
  11     syncer = Synchronizer(
  12         project, default=True, develop=dev,
  13         clean_unneeded=clean,
  14     )
  15 
  16     success = sync(syncer)
  17     if not success:
  18         return 1
  19 
  20     print("Synchronized project at", project.root)
